summary: This document is an internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, where the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) requests assistance from other agents for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The assistance is needed for prepping discovery and reviewing audio recordings, with an urgent timeline by the end of August.

events.title: Discovery Prep Deadline
events.description: The FBI squad C-20 is working towards a deadline at the end of August for prepping discovery items, which includes reviewing a variety of evidence.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) was actively seeking internal assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation in July 2020.
The requested assistance involved two main tasks: prepping for discovery and reviewing audio recordings, with the discovery prep being more urgent.
The investigation was described as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' for assisting agents.
The communication indicates the investigation was ongoing and required significant manpower for evidence review as of late July 2020.
